summary.span: 获取或设置一个从零开始的值，该值指定自变量的计算顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets a zero-based value that specifies the order in which the argument is evaluated.

value.span: 一个指定自变量计算顺序的从零开始的值。

span.span: A zero-based value that specifies the order in which the argument is evaluated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，自变量的计算顺序未指定且等于 值。By default, the evaluation order of the argument is unspecified and is equal to the value. 将 设置为一个大于或等于零的值，以便为此自变量指定一个计算顺序。Set to a value greater or equal to zero to specify an evaluation order for this argument. Windows Workflow Foundation 按指定的计算顺序按升序计算参数。Windows Workflow Foundation evaluates arguments with a specified evaluation order in ascending order. 注意：未指定计算顺序的参数将先于指定计算顺序的参数计算。Note that arguments with an unspecified evaluation order are evaluated before those with a specified evaluation order.

exception.span: 该值不等于 且小于 0。

span.span: The value is less than zero and not equal to .

summary.span: 表示“Result”的常量值，该值对应于表达式基类 中类型为 的 属性的名称。

span.span: Represents the constant value of "Result", which corresponds to the name of the property of type in the expression base class .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此常量可在使用后期绑定时引用表达式活动的结果。Use this constant to reference the result of an expression activity when using late binding.
